title: What's new in version 3.4.1?
summary: New in-app notification feature. Stay up to date with the latest developments!
messagePart1: Murmur Master® is proud to announce a new in-app notification feature! New notifications will appear in the update section on the top left hand corner of the screen.
messagePart2: Stay up to date with all the latest in Cardiology and new Murmur Master® features. We've got some great features coming coming out in the next few months. Also be sure to check out our new YouTube channel, which has incredible high-yield material!

title: Incredible new murmur
summary: Have you ever heard a ball and cage (Starr Edwards) valve replacement?
messagePart1: Have you ever heard a Starr Edwards (Ball and cage) valve replacement? These are older valve replacements, which have been superseded by newer models, such as the bileaflet valve. They have a unique sound profile. Check out this case to learn more!

title: New YT video
messagePart1: New aortic regurgitation (insufficiency) video. Are you a visual learner? This video provides a great summary on aortic regurgitation to help you learn fast!

title: Test your skills!
summary: Have you got what it takes to crack this case?
messagePart1: A 38-year old gentleman presents to the emergency department with 3 hours of chest pain. A language barrier prevents initial assessment of the nature of the pain. His ECG has been highlighted as showing a potential ST-elevation myocardial infarction. What do you think the diagnosis is? Check out his auscultation findings now!

title: New YouTube video
messagePart1: Check out this great summary on atrial fibrillation (AF). A high-yield overview on AF, which is the commonest sustained arrhythmia. Part 1 covers: what AF is, how to recognise it, what causes it and what the symptoms and complications are!

title: Happy new year and festive video!
summary: Happy new year and festive video!
messagePart1: Happy new year from Murmur Master! Check out this festive new YouTube video: the holiday heart syndrome - relevant for the time of year!
